about_the_game:
Original Verdant Chest

Spring has sprung in the world of Don’t Starve, and it’s brought several flourishing fashions with it! In this Verdant Chest you can find the original six Verdant skin sets, wearable in-game by your favorite Don’t Starve Together characters. Enjoy that natural earthy look!

Includes
  • Maxwell’s Verdant Skin Set
  • Wigfrid’s Verdant Skin Set
  • Woodie’s Verdant Skin Set
  • Wes’ Verdant Skin Set
  • Winona’s Verdant Skin Set
  • WX-78’s Verdant Skin Set
detailed_description:
Original Verdant Chest

Spring has sprung in the world of Don’t Starve, and it’s brought several flourishing fashions with it! In this Verdant Chest you can find the original six Verdant skin sets, wearable in-game by your favorite Don’t Starve Together characters. Enjoy that natural earthy look!

Includes

  • Woodie’s Verdant Skin Set

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Not recommended for Intel GMA Graphics or Mac Minis or early-generation MacBooks

short_description: This Verdant Chest contains the original Verdant series. Contains skins for: Maxwell, Wigfrid, Woodie, Wes, Winona, and WX-78.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
